alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued October 22 at 4:24PM PDT until October 22 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTY... At 421 PM PDT, a dust channel originating from Eldorado Valley was resulting in periods of low visibility on Highway 95 and Interstate 11 near Boulder City. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Detected by Department of Transportation cameras. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Boulder City and nearby sections of Highway 95 and Intertate 11. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
